analytic.title: The Early Spread of Christianity in Central Asia and the Far East: A New Document

monogr.title: Bulletin of the John Rylands University Library of Manchester

biblStruct.note: contains translation of a Syriac document (Letter to Abu ‘Afr) attributed to Philoxenus, bishop of Mabbug, and the text of that part of it which deals with the Christian Turks (Syriac Ms. 59 of the John Rylands Library, ff. 99a-107b).

body.bibl: Mingana, Alphonse. “The Early Spread of Christianity in Central Asia and the Far East: A New Document.” Bulletin of the John Rylands University Library of Manchester 9:2 (1925): 297–371.
